raw: {"epics": [{"id": "EPIC-1", "title": "Centralized Offer Recommendation Engine (Choice API)", "description": "Develop and deploy a centralized offer recommendation engine (Choice API) to unify and personalize offer delivery across HDFC Bank's digital assets. This engine will ensure a single source of truth for offers, enable real-time and batch-based recommendations, and support business rules for curation and personalization. Business justification: Ensures offer consistency, increases engagement, and supports scalable, intelligent offer delivery.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 320, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "BE-1", "title": "Develop Offer Recommendation Engine Core", "description": "Build the backend logic for the offer recommendation engine, including rule engine, personalization logic, and merchant/offer curation (repeat capping, fatigue factor, marketer\u2019s veto).", "acceptance_criteria": ["Engine supports rule-based and personalized recommendations.", "Supports merchant and offer curation logic.", "Handles up to 10 million API calls/month.", "Unit and integration tests pass for all business rules."], "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 120, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "BE-1-1", "title": "Design Recommendation Engine Architecture", "description": "Define architecture, data flows, and integration points for the recommendation engine.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-1-2", "title": "Implement Rule Engine", "description": "Develop the rule engine to support offer selection, curation, and prioritization.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 40, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-1-3", "title": "Integrate Personalization Logic", "description": "Implement logic for personalized recommendations based on customer data and preferences.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 32, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-1-4", "title": "Develop Merchant/Offer Curation Features", "description": "Implement repeat capping, fatigue factor, and marketer\u2019s veto logic.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-1-5", "title": "Unit and Integration Testing", "description": "Write and execute tests for all engine components and business rules.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-1-6", "title": "Performance and Load Testing", "description": "Test engine under expected and peak loads (10M-40M API calls/month).", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "BE-2", "title": "Develop Choice API Endpoints", "description": "Expose RESTful APIs for offer recommendations, supporting both real-time and batch-based requests. Ensure secure, scalable, and standardized interfaces.", "acceptance_criteria": ["APIs support real-time and batch offer retrieval.", "APIs use hashed mobile number as identifier.", "APIs are secured and meet HDFC Bank standards.", "API documentation is complete and reviewed."], "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 80, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "BE-2-1", "title": "Design API Contracts", "description": "Define OpenAPI/Swagger specs for all endpoints.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-2-2", "title": "Implement Real-time Offer API", "description": "Develop endpoint for real-time offer recommendations.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 24, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-2-3", "title": "Implement Batch Offer API", "description": "Develop endpoint for batch-based offer retrieval.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-2-4", "title": "API Security and Rate Limiting", "description": "Implement authentication, authorization, and rate limiting.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-2-5", "title": "API Documentation and Testing", "description": "Document APIs and perform end-to-end testing.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "QA-1", "title": "End-to-End QA for Recommendation Engine", "description": "Perform comprehensive QA for the recommendation engine and APIs, including functional, integration, and performance testing.", "acceptance_criteria": ["All test cases pass.", "No critical or high-severity bugs.", "Performance benchmarks are met."], "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 40, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "QA-1-1", "title": "Develop Test Plan and Cases", "description": "Create detailed test plan and cases for all engine and API features.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-1-2", "title": "Functional and Integration Testing", "description": "Execute functional and integration tests.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-1-3", "title": "Performance and Load Testing", "description": "Test system under load and validate scalability.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-1-4", "title": "Bug Fix Verification and Regression", "description": "Verify fixes and perform regression testing.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "PM-1", "title": "Product Management & Stakeholder Alignment", "description": "Coordinate requirements, manage scope, and ensure alignment with business stakeholders for the recommendation engine.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Requirements are documented and signed off.", "Stakeholder reviews are conducted.", "Scope changes are tracked and communicated."], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 20, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "PM-1-1", "title": "Requirements Gathering", "description": "Conduct workshops and document detailed requirements.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "PM-1-2", "title": "Stakeholder Reviews", "description": "Organize and facilitate stakeholder review sessions.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "PM-1-3", "title": "Scope Management", "description": "Track and communicate scope changes.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}]}]}, {"id": "EPIC-2", "title": "Offer Management Platform (OMP) with Maker-Checker Flows", "description": "Design and implement a centralized Offer Management Platform (OMP) to onboard, manage, and approve/reject offers. Includes maker-checker flows, offer templates, and support for onboarding Smartbuy, Alliance, and Consumer Durable Loans offers. Business justification: Enables efficient, auditable, and scalable offer onboarding and management.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 240, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "FE-1", "title": "Design OMP User Interface", "description": "Create a user-friendly UI for offer onboarding, management, and approval/rejection (maker-checker) flows.", "acceptance_criteria": ["UI supports offer onboarding using OMP template.", "Maker and checker personas are supported.", "UI is responsive and meets HDFC Bank branding."], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 40, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-1-1", "title": "Wireframes and UX Design", "description": "Develop wireframes and UX flows for OMP.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-1-2", "title": "UI Implementation", "description": "Implement frontend components for offer onboarding and approval.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 24, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-1-3", "title": "Accessibility and Branding", "description": "Ensure UI meets accessibility and branding guidelines.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "BE-3", "title": "Develop OMP Backend and Maker-Checker Logic", "description": "Implement backend services for offer onboarding, approval/rejection, and audit trails. Support for OMP template and user roles.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Backend supports offer onboarding and approval/rejection.", "Audit trails are maintained.", "OMP template is supported for Smartbuy, Alliance, and CDL offers."], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 64, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "BE-3-1", "title": "Database Schema Design", "description": "Design schema for offers, users, and audit logs.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-3-2", "title": "Offer Onboarding API", "description": "Develop API for onboarding offers using OMP template.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-3-3", "title": "Maker-Checker Workflow Implementation", "description": "Implement logic for maker-checker approval/rejection and audit trails.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 24, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-3-4", "title": "Role-Based Access Control", "description": "Implement user roles and permissions for maker/checker.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-3-5", "title": "Backend Testing", "description": "Write and execute backend unit and integration tests.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "QA-2", "title": "OMP QA and UAT", "description": "Test OMP UI and backend, including maker-checker flows, offer onboarding, and audit trails.", "acceptance_criteria": ["All UI and backend features are tested.", "No critical bugs in maker-checker flows.", "Audit logs are accurate."], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 32, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "QA-2-1", "title": "Test Case Development", "description": "Develop test cases for OMP features.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-2-2", "title": "Functional Testing", "description": "Execute functional tests for onboarding and approval flows.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-2-3", "title": "UAT Support", "description": "Support user acceptance testing and bug fixes.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "PM-2", "title": "OMP Product Management & Training", "description": "Manage requirements, coordinate with stakeholders, and provide training for OMP users.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Requirements are documented and signed off.", "Training materials are delivered.", "Stakeholder feedback is incorporated."], "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "PM-2-1", "title": "Requirements Documentation", "description": "Document detailed requirements for OMP.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "PM-2-2", "title": "description": "Develop and deliver training for OMP users.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}]}]}, {"id": "EPIC-3", "title": "Customer Data Integration and Batch Processing", "description": "Integrate monthly CIU files (parquet, SFTP, up to 50GB) for customer data, generate batch files for non-Smartbuy assets, and ensure standardized data formats. Business justification: Enables accurate, scalable, and timely offer recommendations for all customer segments.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 200, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "DE-1", "title": "CIU File Ingestion and Processing", "description": "Automate ingestion of monthly CIU files (parquet, SFTP), validate data, and process for offer recommendations.", "acceptance_criteria": ["CIU files are ingested and validated automatically.", "Data is processed and available for offer engine.", "Checksum validation and error handling are implemented."], "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 56, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "DE-1-1", "title": "SFTP Integration and Automation", "description": "Automate SFTP download and checksum handling for data ingestion.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 16, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "DE-1-4", "title": "Integration with Offer Engine", "description": "Make processed data available to the offer engine.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "DE-2", "title": "Batch File Generation for Non-Smartbuy Assets", "description": "Generate monthly full and daily delta batch files for non-Smartbuy assets, supporting standardized formats and secure SFTP transfer.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Batch files are generated as per schedule.", "Files follow
